body: [Here](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Surface_by_surface_geometry_preparation_for_daylight_simulation_II) is an example that follows the workflow that Claudio mentioned. There are more examples on Hydra for putting a daylight model together. You can use any of the components as far as they create a Honeybee object. Check [this one](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Surface_by_surface_geometry_preparation_for_daylight_simulation_I) for another example.
